title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook
---
Using H2O ai for machine learning, install h20 with install.packages('h20')

```{r}
library(h2o)
h2o.init()
```

Get Data

```{r}
url <- "http://h2o-public-test-data.s3.amazonaws.com/smalldata/iris/iris_wheader.csv"

iris <- h2o.importFile(url)

```

Train-Test Split
```{r}
parts <- h2o.splitFrame(iris, 0.8, seed =123)
train <- parts[[1]]
test <- parts[[2]]
```

Examine Data
```{r}
summary(train)
nrow(train)
nrow(test)
```

Train Deep Learning model
```{r}
mDL <- h2o.deeplearning(1:4, 5 ,train)
```

```{r}
mDL
```

Use model
```{r}
p <- h2o.predict(mDL, test)
```
```{r}
p
```

check model performance
```{r}
h2o.performance(mDL, test)
```
